attributes.action: Disallow SIA Licensing for those unskilled in basic local communication & understanding
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: NB: NOT BEING PREJUDICE IN ANY WAY - The SIA is allowing many people - who cannot communicate in good english and do not understand the culture and social 'ways' of the population - to gain SIA licenses to work. In these trusted positions it should be made mandatory that a minimum level of communication skill and understanding of society is proven. Why are people who don't have these BASIC skills allowed to work in these positions?
